title: Gladiator
plot: Maximus is a powerful Roman general, loved by the people and the aging Emperor, Marcus Aurelius. Before his death, the Emperor chooses Maximus to be his heir over his own son, Commodus, and a power struggle leaves Maximus and his family condemned to death. The powerful general is unable to save his family, and his loss of will allows him to get captured and put into the Gladiator games until he dies. The only desire that fuels him now is the chance to rise to the top so that he will be able to look into the eyes of the man who will feel his revenge.
awards: Top Rated Movies #40 | Won 5 Oscars. Another 54 wins & 106 nominations.
writers: David Franzoni, John Logan, William Nicholson
stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
companies: Dreamworks Pictures, Universal Pictures, Scott Free Productions

trailer.title: Gladiator
trailer.videoDescription: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

tagline: What We Do In Life Echoes In Eternity.

similars.title: Braveheart
similars.plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
similars.stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan

similars.title: Saving Private Ryan
similars.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore

similars.title: The Green Mile
similars.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse

similars.title: Forrest Gump
similars.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

similars.title: The Matrix
similars.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

similars.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
similars.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
similars.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
similars.stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

similars.title: The Departed
similars.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
similars.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson

similars.title: Se7en
similars.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
similars.stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey

similars.title: The Silence of the Lambs
similars.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
similars.stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

similars.title: Django Unchained
similars.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.
similars.stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

similars.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
similars.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002)
similars.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
similars.stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

similars.title: Fight Club
similars.plot: A nameless first person narrator (Edward Norton) attends support groups in attempt to subdue his emotional state and relieve his insomniac state. When he meets Marla (Helena Bonham Carter),... See full summary »
similars.stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
